original: Berner, Aron Ponitus, fabrikör, Borås, f. 11/10/83. i Alingsås. G. 39 m. Berit Ahlberg. Barn: Lena f. 41, Inger 43. — Genomg. Alingsås h. a. 1. Anst. h. Alingsås Bomullsväveri A-B 98-14, repr. i Sthlm o. n. Sv:e f. Sthlms Bomullsspinneri & Väfveri A-B 15-16, kont:chef h. Norrby Nya A-B i Borås 17-18, chef o. huv:deläg. i Berniers A-B i Borås sed. 18. Led. av Styr. f. sistnämnda föret. Res. t. Tyskl., Schweiz, Tjecko’slov., Danm. o. Norge. Hobbies: arb., resor o. böcker.
translated: Berner, Aron Ponitus, manufacturer, Borås, b. 11/10/83 in Alingsås. Married in 1939 to Berit Ahlberg. Children: Lena b. 1941, Inger b. 1943. He attended Alingsås school. Employed at Alingsås Bomullsväveri A-B from 1898 to 1914, representative in Stockholm and other parts of Sweden for Sthlms Bomullsspinneri & Väfveri A-B from 1915 to 1916, became managing director of Norrby Nya A-B in Borås from 1917 to 1918, then became chief executive officer and main owner of Berniers A-B in Borås from 1918 onwards. He was a member of the Board of Directors for the latter company. Traveled to Germany, Switzerland, Czechoslovakia, Denmark, and Norway. Hobbies: work, travel, and books.
